question: Which Indian sportsperson has won gold in the girls' Under-12 category at the World Cadets Chess Championship?
explanation: Divya Deshmukh (11) has won gold in the girls\' Under-12 category at the World Cadets Chess Championship at Pocos de Caldas, Brazil. She scored a total of 9.5 points to give India its only medal in the championship this year. It is Divya\'s second world title after her victory in the under-10 World Youth Chess Championship-2014 in Durban.
